entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 10:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -18.5°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -21.6°C
Wind: NW 27 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
